column5: Seems like most places are weekly in the summer time. The only place I have found is Burleigh Island Lodge. Does anyone know of any others?Thx
Try airbnb Yup  But to the OP what is it and where you are looking for in the CoKL area?
I think I heard that Lunge Haven did short term rentals. Not 100% on that though.
Reach Harbour on Lower Buckhorn has nightly cottage rentals. Two of the cottages have recently been renovated
